ygData.subject: Re: Make research fun
ygData.msgSnippet: Do you need something special to get into the Library at Erudin?  I ve never been there, but I ask because I was near Qeynos one time and a guard walked by me,
ygData.messageBody:
Do you need something special to get into the Library at Erudin? I've never
been there, but I ask because I was near Qeynos one time and a guard walked
by me, and he said "My! Did I just drop something?" And he walked on. I
looked and found what looks like a library card, marked Library of Erudin.
Is this a quest item? Or do you need a card to visit the library?


----- Original Message -----
From: Jay Hollums <jhollums@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, June 21, 1999 7:41 AM
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Make research fun


> From: "Jay Hollums" <jhollums@...>
>
> Erudin Erudin Erudin.... click your heels together 3 times as well... and
> poof you wont be in Kansas any more...[look to the library]
>
> Rutreeii
> Cazic-Thul
>
